1.name: Bulbasaur
1.description: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.

2.name: Ivysaur
2.description: The bulb on its back grows as it absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off a pleasant aroma when it blooms.

3.name: Venusaur
3.description: As it warms itself and absorbs the sunlight, its flower petals release a pleasant fragrance.

3.name: Mega Venusaur
3.description: As it warms itself and absorbs the sunlight, its flower petals release a pleasant fragrance.

4.name: Charmander
4.description: If it's healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigorously, even if it gets a bit wet.

5.name: Charmeleon
5.description: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

6.name: Charizard
6.description: It uses its wings to fly high. The temperature of its fire increases as it gains experience in battle.

6.name: Mega Charizard X
6.description: It uses its wings to fly high. The temperature of its fire increases as it gains experience in battle.

6.name: Mega Charizard Y
6.description: It uses its wings to fly high. The temperature of its fire increases as it gains experience in battle.

7.name: Squirtle
7.description: When it feels threatened, it draws its legs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

8.name: Wartortle
8.description: Its long, furry tail is a symbol of longevity, making it quite popular among older people.

9.name: Blastoise
9.description: It firmly plants its feet on the ground before shooting water from the jets on its back.

9.name: Mega Blastoise
9.description: It firmly plants its feet on the ground before shooting water from the jets on its back.

10.name: Caterpie
10.description: It crawls into foliage where it camouflages itself among leaves that are the same color as its body.

11.name: Metapod
11.description: This is its pre-evolved form. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

12.name: Butterfree
12.description: It flits from flower to flower, collecting honey. It can even identify distant flowers in bloom.

13.name: Weedle
13.description: The barb on top of its head secretes a strong poison. It uses this toxic barb to protect itself.

14.name: Kakuna
14.description: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.

15.name: Beedrill
15.description: It uses sharp, poisonous stings to defeat prey, then takes the victim back to its nest for food.

15.name: Mega Beedrill
15.description: It uses sharp, poisonous stings to defeat prey, then takes the victim back to its nest for food.

16.name: Pidgey
16.description: It rapidly flaps its wings in the grass, stirring up a dust cloud that drives insect prey out into the open.

17.name: Pidgeotto
17.description: It slowly flies in a circular pattern, all the while keeping a sharp lookout for prey.

18.name: Pidgeot
18.description: Its outstanding vision allows it to spot splashing MAGIKARP, even while flying at 3300 feet.

18.name: Mega Pidgeot
18.description: Its outstanding vision allows it to spot splashing MAGIKARP, even while flying at 3300 feet.

19.name: Rattata
19.description: This Pokémon's impressive vitality allows it to live anywhere. It also multiplies very quickly.

19.name: Alolan Rattata
19.description: This Pokémon's impressive vitality allows it to live anywhere. It also multiplies very quickly.

20.name: Raticate
20.description: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.

20.name: Alolan Raticate
20.description: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.

21.name: Spearow
21.description: To protect its territory, it flies around ceaselessly, making high-pitched cries.

22.name: Fearow
22.description: It uses its long beak to attack. It has a surprisingly long reach, so it must be treated with caution.

23.name: Ekans
23.description: It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.

24.name: Arbok
24.description: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.

25.name: Pikachu
25.description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

26.name: Raichu
26.description: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

26.name: Alolan Raichu
26.description: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

27.name: Sandshrew
27.description: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.

27.name: Alolan Sandshrew
27.description: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.

28.name: Sandslash
28.description: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.

28.name: Alolan Sandslash
28.description: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.

29.name: Nidoran♀
29.description: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.

30.name: Nidorina
30.description: It has a docile nature. If it is threatened with attack, it raises the barbs that are all over its body.

31.name: Nidoqueen
31.description: The hard scales that cover its strong body serve as excellent protection from any attack.

32.name: Nidoran♂
32.description: It constantly moves its large ears in many directions in order to detect danger right away.

33.name: Nidorino
33.description: It is easily agitated and uses its horn for offense as soon as it notices an attacker.

34.name: Nidoking
34.description: It uses its thick arms, legs and tail to attack forcefully. Melee combat is its specialty.

35.name: Clefairy
35.description: Though rarely seen, it becomes easier to spot, for some reason, on the night of a full moon.

36.name: Clefable
36.description: Said to live in quiet, remote mountains, this type of fairy has a strong aversion to being seen.

37.name: Vulpix
37.description: As its body grows larger, its six warm tails become more beautiful, with a more luxurious coat of fur.

37.name: Alolan Vulpix
37.description: As its body grows larger, its six warm tails become more beautiful, with a more luxurious coat of fur.

38.name: Ninetales
38.description: It is said to live a thousand years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

38.name: Alolan Ninetales
38.description: It is said to live a thousand years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

39.name: Jigglypuff
39.description: It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.

40.name: Wigglytuff
40.description: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can't stop touching it.

41.name: Zubat
41.description: During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.

42.name: Golbat
42.description: When it plunges its fangs into its prey, it instantly draws and gulps down more than ten ounces of blood.

43.name: Oddish
43.description: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

44.name: Gloom
44.description: The smell from its drool-like syrup and the pollen on its petals is so bad, it may make opponents faint.

45.name: Vileplume
45.description: By shaking its big petals, it scatters toxic pollen into the air, turning the air yellow.

46.name: Paras
46.description: The tochukaso growing on this POKéMON's back orders it to extract juice from tree trunks.

47.name: Parasect
47.description: When nothing's left to extract from the bug, the mushrooms on its back leave spores on the bug's egg.

48.name: Venonat
48.description: The small bugs it eats appear only at night, so it sleeps in a hole in a tree until night falls.

49.name: Venomoth
49.description: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.

50.name: Diglett
50.description: It digs underground and chews on tree roots, sticking its head out only when the sun isn't bright.

50.name: Alolan Diglett
50.description: It digs underground and chews on tree roots, sticking its head out only when the sun isn't bright.

51.name: Dugtrio
51.description: These DIGLETT triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it's like underground.

51.name: Alolan Dugtrio
51.description: These DIGLETT triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it's like underground.

52.name: Meowth
52.description: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines too.

52.name: Alolan Meowth
52.description: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines too.

53.name: Persian
53.description: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.

53.name: Alolan Persian
53.description: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.

54.name: Psyduck
54.description: The only time it can use its psychic power is when its sleeping brain cells happen to wake.

55.name: Golduck
55.description: It swims gracefully along on the quiet, slow-moving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.

56.name: Mankey
56.description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

57.name: Primeape
57.description: It will beat up anyone who makes it mad, even if it has to chase them until the end of the world.

58.name: Growlithe
58.description: It controls a big territory. If it detects an unknown smell, it roars loudly to force out the intruder.

59.name: Arcanine
59.description: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were attracted to its movement as it ran through prairies.

60.name: Poliwag
60.description: The swirl on its belly is its insides showing through the skin. It looks clearer after it eats.

61.name: Poliwhirl
61.description: Though it is skilled at walking, it prefers to live underwater where there is less danger.

62.name: Poliwrath
62.description: It can use its well-developed arms and legs to run on the surface of the water for a split second.

63.name: Abra
63.description: It hypnotizes itself so that it can teleport away when it senses danger, even if it is asleep.

64.name: Kadabra
64.description: When it closes its eyes, twice as many alpha particles come out of the surface of its body.

65.name: Alakazam
65.description: It has an IQ of 5000. It calculates many things in order to gain the edge in every battle.

65.name: Mega Alakazam
65.description: It has an IQ of 5000. It calculates many things in order to gain the edge in every battle.

66.name: Machop
66.description: It trains by lifting rocks in the mountains. It can even pick up a GRAVELER with ease.

67.name: Machoke
67.description: This tough POKéMON always stays in the zone. Its muscles become thicker after every battle.

68.name: Machamp
68.description: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.

69.name: Bellsprout
69.description: If it notices anything that moves, it immediately flings its vine at the object.

70.name: Weepinbell
70.description: When it's hungry, it swings its razor-sharp leaves, slicing up any unlucky object nearby for food.

71.name: Victreebel
71.description: Once ingested into this POKéMON's body, even the hardest object will melt into nothing.

72.name: Tentacool
72.description: As it floats along on the waves, it uses its toxic feelers to stab anything it touches.

73.name: Tentacruel
73.description: When its 80 feelers absorb water, it stretches to become like a net to entangle its prey.

74.name: Geodude
74.description: Proud of their sturdy bodies, they bash against each other in a contest to prove whose is harder.

74.name: Alolan Geodude
74.description: Proud of their sturdy bodies, they bash against each other in a contest to prove whose is harder.

75.name: Graveler
75.description: It travels by rolling on mountain paths. If it gains too much speed, it stops by running into huge rocks.

75.name: Alolan Graveler
75.description: It travels by rolling on mountain paths. If it gains too much speed, it stops by running into huge rocks.

76.name: Golem
76.description: Its rock-like body is so durable, even high-powered dynamite blasts fail to scratch its rugged hide.

76.name: Alolan Golem
76.description: Its rock-like body is so durable, even high-powered dynamite blasts fail to scratch its rugged hide.

77.name: Ponyta
77.description: Training by jumping over grass that grows longer every day has made it a world-class jumper.

78.name: Rapidash
78.description: It just loves to gallop. The faster it goes, the longer the swaying flames of its mane will become.

79.name: Slowpoke
79.description: It is always so absent-minded that it won't react, even if its flavorful tail is bitten.

80.name: Slowbro
80.description: An attached SHELLDER won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

80.name: Mega Slowbro
80.description: An attached SHELLDER won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

81.name: Magnemite
81.description: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.

82.name: Magneton
82.description: When many MAGNETON gather together, the resulting magnetic storm disrupts radio waves.

83.name: Farfetch'd
83.description: In order to prevent their extinction, more people have made an effort to breed these POKéMON.

84.name: Doduo
84.description: It lives on a grassy plain where it can see a long way. If it sees an enemy, it runs away at 60 mph.

85.name: Dodrio
85.description: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads--even for a second--will get pecked severely.

86.name: Seel
86.description: The light blue fur that covers it keeps it protected against the cold. It loves iceberg-filled oceans.

87.name: Dewgong
87.description: It sleeps under shallow ocean waters during the day, then looks for food at night when it's cold.

88.name: Grimer
88.description: When two of these POKéMON's bodies are combined together, new poisons are created.

88.name: Alolan Grimer
88.description: When two of these POKéMON's bodies are combined together, new poisons are created.

89.name: Muk
89.description: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.

89.name: Alolan Muk
89.description: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.

90.name: Shellder
90.description: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.

91.name: Cloyster
91.description: Even a missile can't break the spikes it uses to stab opponents. They're even harder than its shell.

92.name: Gastly
92.description: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

93.name: Haunter
93.description: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.

94.name: Gengar
94.description: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

94.name: Mega Gengar
94.description: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

95.name: Onix
95.description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

96.name: Drowzee
96.description: When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.

97.name: Hypno
97.description: The longer it swings its pendulum, the longer the effects of its hypnosis last.

98.name: Krabby
98.description: If it is unable to find food, it will absorb nutrients by swallowing a mouthful of sand.

99.name: Kingler
99.description: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it's not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

100.name: Voltorb
100.description: During the study of this POKéMON, it was discovered that its components are not found in nature.

101.name: Electrode
101.description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

102.name: Exeggcute
102.description: If even one is separated from the group, the energy bond between the six will make them rejoin instantly.

103.name: Exeggutor
103.description: Living in a good environment makes it grow lots of heads. A head that drops off becomes an EXEGGCUTE.

103.name: Alolan Exeggutor
103.description: Living in a good environment makes it grow lots of heads. A head that drops off becomes an EXEGGCUTE.

104.name: Cubone
104.description: It lost its mother after its birth. It wears its mother's skull, never revealing its true face.

105.name: Marowak
105.description: Somewhere in the world is a cemetery just for MAROWAK. It gets its bones from those graves.

105.name: Alolan Marowak
105.description: Somewhere in the world is a cemetery just for MAROWAK. It gets its bones from those graves.

106.name: Hitmonlee
106.description: It is also called the Kick Master. It uses its elastic legs to execute every known kick.

107.name: Hitmonchan
107.description: To increase the strength of all its punch moves, it spins its arms just before making contact.

108.name: Lickitung
108.description: It has a tongue that is over 6’6’’ long. It uses this long tongue to lick its body clean.

109.name: Koffing
109.description: If one gets close enough to it when it expels poisonous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.

110.name: Weezing
110.description: When it inhales poisonous gases from garbage, its body expands, and its insides smell much worse.

111.name: Rhyhorn
111.description: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.

112.name: Rhyhorn
112.description: By lightly spinning its drill-like horn, it can easily shatter even a diamond in the rough.

113.name: Chansey
113.description: People try to catch it for its extremely nutritious eggs, but it rarely can be found.

114.name: Tangela
114.description: During battle, it constantly moves the vines that cover its body in order to annoy its opponent.

115.name: Kangaskhan
115.description: To avoid crushing the baby it carries in its pouch, it always sleeps standing up.

115.name: Mega Kangaskhan
115.description: To avoid crushing the baby it carries in its pouch, it always sleeps standing up.

116.name: Horsea
116.description: When they're in a safe location, they can be seen playfully tangling their tails together.

117.name: Seadra
117.description: The male raises the young. If it is approached, it uses its toxic spikes to fend off the intruder.

118.name: Goldeen
118.description: During spawning season, they swim gracefully in the water, searching for their perfect mate.

119.name: Seaking
119.description: When autumn comes, the males patrol the area around their nests in order to protect their offspring.

120.name: Staryu
120.description: When the stars twinkle at night, it floats up from the sea floor, and its body's center core flickers.

121.name: Starmie
121.description: It is said that it uses the seven-colored core of its body to send electric waves into outer space.

122.name: Mr. Mime
122.description: It uses the mysterious power it has in its fingers to solidify air into an invisible wall.

123.name: Scyther
123.description: It's very proud of its speed. It moves so fast that its opponent does not even know what knocked it down.

124.name: Jynx
124.description: It has several different cry patterns, each of which seems to have its own meaning.

125.name: Electabuzz
125.description: When two ELECTABUZZ touch, they control the electric currents to communicate their feelings.

126.name: Magmar
126.description: It moves more frequently in hot areas. It can heal itself by dipping its wound into lava.

127.name: Pinsir
127.description: When the temperature drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.

127.name: Mega Pinsir
127.description: When the temperature drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.

128.name: Tauros
128.description: These violent POKéMON fight with other members of their herd in order to prove their strength.

129.name: Magikarp
129.description: This weak and pathetic POKéMON gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

130.name: Gyarados
130.description: It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

130.name: Mega Gyarados
130.description: It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.

131.name: Lapras
131.description: This gentle POKéMON loves to give people rides and provides a very comfortable way to get around.

132.name: Ditto
132.description: When it encounters another DITTO, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

133.name: Eevee
133.description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

134.name: Vaporeon
134.description: As it uses the fins on the tip of its tail to swim, it blends with the water perfectly.

135.name: Jolteon
135.description: The negatively charged ions generated in its fur create a constant sparking noise.

136.name: Flareon
136.description: Once it has stored up enough heat, this POKéMON's body temperature can reach up to 1700 degrees.

137.name: Porygon
137.description: An artificial POKéMON created due to extensive research, it can perform only what is in its program.

138.name: Omanyte
138.description: In prehistoric times, it swam on the sea floor, eating plankton. Its fossils are sometimes found.

139.name: Omastar
139.description: Its heavy shell allowed it to reach only nearby food. This could be the reason it is extinct.

140.name: Kabuto
140.description: Three hundred million years ago, it hid on the sea floor. It also has eyes on its back that glow.

141.name: Kabutops
141.description: It was able to swim quickly through the water by compactly folding up its razor-sharp sickles.

142.name: Aerodactyl
142.description: In prehistoric times, this POKéMON flew freely and fearlessly through the skies.

142.name: Mega Aerodactyl
142.description: In prehistoric times, this POKéMON flew freely and fearlessly through the skies.

143.name: Snorlax
143.description: This POKéMON's stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

144.name: Articuno
144.description: Legendary bird POKéMON. As it flies through the sky, it cools the air, causing snow to fall.

145.name: Zapdos
145.description: Legendary bird POKéMON. They say lightning caused by the flapping of its wings causes summer storms.

146.name: Moltres
146.description: Legendary bird POKéMON. It is said to migrate from the south along with the spring.

147.name: Dratini
147.description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

148.name: Dragonair
148.description: It is called the divine POKéMON. When its entire body brightens slightly, the weather changes.

149.name: Dragonite
149.description: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.

150.name: Mewtwo
150.description: Said to rest quietly in an undiscovered cave, this POKéMON was created solely for battling.

150.name: Mega Mewtwo X
150.description: Said to rest quietly in an undiscovered cave, this POKéMON was created solely for battling.

150.name: Mega Mewtwo Y
150.description: Said to rest quietly in an undiscovered cave, this POKéMON was created solely for battling.

151.name: Mew
151.description: Because it can learn any move, some people began research to see if it is the ancestor of all POKéMON.
